properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior.
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.description: Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat. The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms. This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10 year building guarantee.

This stunning one-bedroom apartment is located in the heart of the city, offering a modern lifestyle with easy access to local amenities and transport links. Featuring an open-plan kitchen and living area with floor-to-ceiling windows, a spacious double bedroom, and a contemporary bathroom. The building offers concierge services, a fitness center, and a rooftop terrace.
properties.location: High Street, City Center, London EC1

properties.description: Spacious four-bedroom detached bungalow located in a quiet cul-de-sac. This property offers a large living room, a separate dining area, a modern kitchen, and a well-maintained garden with a patio. The master bedroom features an en-suite shower room, and the remaining bedrooms are generously sized. Double garage and off-street parking included.

Charming two-bedroom cottage set in a picturesque village. The property boasts a cozy living room with a log burner, a country-style kitchen, and a beautifully landscaped garden with a pond. Both bedrooms have built-in wardrobes, and the bathroom includes a freestanding tub and shower. Located close to local pubs and walking trails.

Elegant five-bedroom townhouse in a prestigious neighborhood. Featuring a grand entrance hall, three reception rooms, a spacious kitchen with a dining area, and a private garden. The master suite includes a dressing room and en-suite bathroom, while additional bedrooms are bright and airy. Ample storage, a cellar, and a double garage complete this home.

Immaculately presented three-bedroom duplex apartment with breathtaking river views. This property offers an open-plan living space, a modern kitchen with integrated appliances, and a private balcony. The master bedroom has an en-suite, and there is an additional family bathroom. Secure underground parking and a 24-hour concierge are included.

A charming three-bedroom detached house located in a peaceful suburban neighborhood. This property features a spacious living room, a modern kitchen with dining space, and a beautiful garden. Perfect for families, it also includes a private driveway and a garage.

Experience luxury living in this exquisite two-bedroom penthouse offering panoramic city views. Boasting a large open-plan living and dining area, a modern kitchen with high-end appliances, and a private terrace. Residents enjoy exclusive access to a swimming pool, gym, and 24/7 concierge service.
